paper_abstract: We extend a result of Napp Avelli, van der Put, and Rocha with a system-theoretic interpretation to the noncommutative case: Let be a f.g. projective module over a two-sided Noetherian domain. If admits a subdirect product structure of the form over a factor module of grade at least then the torsion-free factor of (resp. ) is projective.
paper_title: On subdirect factors of a projective module and applications to system theory
